evoter.mobile.abstracts

Class EVoterActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • evoter.mobile.abstracts.EVoterActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptedStudentsActivity, ItemDataActivity, LoginActivity, NewQuestionActivity, NewSessionActivity, QuestionDetailActivity, QuestionStatisticActivity, RegisterActivity, ResetPasswordActivity, StartActivity, StudentFeedbackActivity, SubjectUserActivity

    public abstract class EVoterActivity
extends Activity

    Update by @author luongnv89 on 12-Feb-2014:
  • add logout request to server
    Update by @author luongnv89 on 09-Feb-2014:
  • Change the name of EVoterMainMenu variable to mainMenu

    Update by @author luongnv89 on Thu 30-Jan-2014:
  • Add constructor for OfflineEVoterManager
    On Sat - 18/01/2014 - modified by luongnv89:

    Add exit() - to exit application from anywhere when the application has error, exception,... avoid stuck phone EVoterActivity is a parent class of all activity of eVoterMobile application
    Created by @author luongnv89

      Reload data and re-build component of activity
      Request to server to reload data
      If request data return successful, re-build component of activity base on new data
      otherwise, keep current content
      void setQuestionActivityMenu()
      Setup main menu for activity QuestionActivity and lower level
      protected void setupContentMainMenu()
      Setup the content of menu depend on current activity Global menu: Show for all activity
      EVoterMainMenu.MN_EXIT exit application
      EVoterMainMenu.MN_LOGOUT logout of system
      EVoterMainMenu.MN_CANCELcancel menu option Subject menu: Show the option in a subject.
      protected void setupMainMenu()
      Setup main menu action
      protected void setupTitleBar()
      Set title bar of activity When user click on ivTitleBarIcon, show the main menu option of current activity When user click on ivTitleBarRefresh, refresh content (data + interface) of current activity The content of title bar depend on activity:
      In StartActivity, LoginActivity, RegisterActivity, ResetPasswordActivity show app name
      In SubjectActivity show username
      In SubjectUserActivity, SessionActivity, NewSessionActivity, show current subject title
      In QuestionActivity, EditSessionActivity, AcceptedStudentsActivity, StudentFeedbackActivity show current session title
      In QuestionDetailActivity, QuestionStatisticActivity, EditQuestionActivity show current question

      Shutdown application when there is some exception

    • Field Detail

      • ivTitleBarIcon

        protected ImageView ivTitleBarIcon
        Image which is the title bar icon (on the left-top) of eVoterMobile. The same for all activities. When user touch to this icon, the main menu of eVoterMobile will be showed.

      • tvTitleBarContent

        protected TextView tvTitleBarContent
        Which is present on the title bar of eVoterMobile. Different for each activities.
        Show the username in SubjectActivity
        Show the current subject name in SessionActivity
        Show the current session name in QuestionActivity and AnswerActivity

      • ivTitleBarRefresh

        protected ImageView ivTitleBarRefresh
        Image which is showed on the right-top of screen. When the user touch to this icon, the activity will reload the data for current activity

      • dialogLoading

        protected Dialog dialogLoading
        The dialog show the information of loading data process

      • tvLoadingStatus

        protected TextView tvLoadingStatus
        The status of loading data process: loading,...finished,...

      • internetProcessBar

        protected ProgressBar internetProcessBar
        The progressbar show the progress of data loading process

      • offlineEVoterManager

        protected OfflineEVoterManager offlineEVoterManager
        manage the offline data of eVoterMobile

      • mainMenu

        protected EVoterMainMenu mainMenu

    • Constructor Detail

      • EVoterActivity

        public EVoterActivity()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • setupContentMainMenu

        protected void setupContentMainMenu()
        Setup the content of menu depend on current activity
      • Global menu: Show for all activity
        EVoterMainMenu.MN_EXIT exit application
        EVoterMainMenu.MN_LOGOUT logout of system
        EVoterMainMenu.MN_CANCELcancel menu option
      • Subject menu: Show the option in a subject. SessionActivity and lower level
        EVoterMainMenu.MN_USER_OF_SUBJECT show user of subject
        EVoterMainMenu.MN_NEW_SESSION create new session in current subject
      • Session menu: Show the option in a session. For QuestionActivity and lower level
        EVoterMainMenu.MN_START_SESSION active current session
        EVoterMainMenu.MN_STOP_SESSION inactive current session
        EVoterMainMenu.MN_NEW_QUESTION create new question in current session
        EVoterMainMenu.MN_ACCEPT_STUDENT show student who has accepted to join session
        EVoterMainMenu.MN_JOIN Student join session
      • Question

  • setupTitleBar

    protected void setupTitleBar()
    Set title bar of activity
  • When user click on ivTitleBarIcon, show the main menu option of current activity
  • When user click on ivTitleBarRefresh, refresh content (data + interface) of current activity
  • The content of title bar depend on activity:
    In StartActivity, LoginActivity, RegisterActivity, ResetPasswordActivity show app name
    In SubjectActivity show username
    In SubjectUserActivity, SessionActivity, NewSessionActivity, show current subject title
    In QuestionActivity, EditSessionActivity, AcceptedStudentsActivity, StudentFeedbackActivity show current session title
    In QuestionDetailActivity, QuestionStatisticActivity, EditQuestionActivity show current question

  • refeshContent

    public void refeshContent()
    Reload data and re-build component of activity
    Request to server to reload data
    If request data return successful, re-build component of activity base on new data
    otherwise, keep current content

  • setupMainMenu

    protected void setupMainMenu()
    Setup main menu action

  • exit

    public void exit()
    exit application from anywhere in application
    Show a dialog to confirm exiting application

  • exitApplication

    public void exitApplication()
    Exit application

  • logout

    protected void logout()

  • updateRequestCallBack

    public void updateRequestCallBack(java.lang.String response,
                         java.lang.String callBackMessage)
    Callback function.
    According to CallBackMessage to process data
    Parameters:
    response - response which eVoterMobile receive from server
    callBackMessage - value at CallBackMessage

  • shutdownByException

    public void shutdownByException()
    Shutdown application when there is some exception
